com.impossibl.stencil.api

Interface Preparable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnnotatedCallablePreparableBase, AnnotatedPreparableBase, RawFunction

    public interface Preparable
    An object that can be executed via prepare syntax (aka block passing).
    Author:
    kdubb

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ALL_BLOCK_NAME 
      static String[] ALL_BLOCKS 
      static String UNNAMED_BLOCK_NAME 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String[] getBlockNames()
      Gets the block names this preparable will accept.
      Object prepare(Map<String,Block> params)
      Execute the preparable with the given parameters.

    • Field Detail

      • ALL_BLOCK_NAME

        static final String ALL_BLOCK_NAME
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ALL_BLOCKS

        static final String[] ALL_BLOCKS

      • UNNAMED_BLOCK_NAME

        static final String UNNAMED_BLOCK_NAME
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getBlockNames

        String[] getBlockNames()
        Gets the block names this preparable will accept. Returning a single parameter name of ALL_BLOCK_NAME will result in the prepare method being invoked with all blocks passed.
        Returns:
        Array of parameter names in order
        See Also:
        ALL_BLOCK_NAME, ALL_BLOCKS, prepare(Map)

      • prepare

        Object prepare(Map<String,Block> params)
               throws Throwable
        Execute the preparable with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        params - Map of blocks passed in
        Returns:
        The result of the execution
        Throws:
        Throwable - Author may throw any exception
